Evaluation metrics: Log-likelihood, Bayesian information criterion, predicted conversion rate

Models: DT, RF, LR, NN, SVM, RL, KNN (16)

Targets: Purchase or no purchase visit and item bought
Evaluation metrics: Custom score from RecSys 2015 Challenge, precision, recall, training time

Targets: Purchase within next 24 hours of current visit
Purchase or no purchase visit and item bought
Purchase within next 7 days of current visit
Purchase, abandoned cart or browsing-only visit

Evaluation metrics: ACC, F-score, true-positive/true-negative rate, statistical significance
